channel.title: 清空 on Mryqu's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in 清空 on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: MySQL:清空具有外键约束的表
item.description: 最近在MySQL Workbench上使用"TRUNCATE TABLE TABLE_E;“清空一个表时返回错误：Error Code: 1701. Cannot truncate a table referenced in a foreignkey constraint (yqutesting.table_f, CONSTRAINT table_f_ibfk_4FOREIGN KEY (old_id) REFERENCES yqutesting.table_e(ID))解决方法1: 删除约束 清空表 手工删除引用该表的记录 创建约束解决方法2: SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0; TRUNCATE TABLE TABLE_E; SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1; 参考: truncate foreign key constrained table
